GET /accounts/{account_identifier}/vecto.description: Returns a list of Vectorize Indexes

dimensions.description: Specifies the number of dimensions for the index

metric.description: Specifies the type of metric to use calculating distance.

POST /accounts/{account_identifier}/vect.description: Creates and returns a new Vectorize Index.

POST /accounts/{account_identifier}/vect.description: Inserts vectors into the specified index and returns the count of values and ids successfully inserted.

schema.description: ndjson file containing vectors to insert.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Specifies the count of the vectors successfully inserted.

ids.description: Array of vector identifiers of the vectors successfully inserted.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful

POST /accounts/{account_identifier}/vect.description: Finds vectors closest to a given vector in an index.

returnVectors.description: Whether to return the values of the closest vectors, or just their IDs

topK.description: The number of results to return

vector.description: The vector to find neighbors of

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Specifies the count of vectors returned by the search

matches.description: Array of vectors matched by the search

score.description: The score of the vector according to the index's distance metric

vector.description: If the returnVectors option is set, the vector itself

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful

POST /accounts/{account_identifier}/vect.description: Upserts vectors into the specified index, creating them if they do not exist and returns the count of values and ids successfully inserted.

schema.description: ndjson file containing vectors to upsert.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Specifies the count of the vectors successfully inserted.

ids.description: Array of vector identifiers of the vectors successfully inserted.
